Sentencas: Developments in solid oxide-ion (O2-) conductors have led to various energy and environmental technologies, such as gas sensors, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and oxygen-separation membranes.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: The research on SOFCs with lower operating temperature and higher energy efficiency has stimulated the discovery of new oxide-ion conductors and improved understanding of oxide-ion diffusion mechanisms.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: Although there exist a variety of structure types in hexagonal perovskite-related materials, oxide-ion conductors are quite rare and their oxide-ion diffusion pathways are unclear.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: In the present work, we report the first experimental visualization of oxide-ion diffusion pathways in the hexagonal perovskite-related material Ba3MoNbO8.5-delta by in situ neutron diffraction (21-1100 degrees C) and the maximum-entropy method, where delta is the oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: Oxide ions were found to migrate two-dimensionally through mixed O2 octahedral and O3 tetrahedral oxygen sites over the O2-O2-O2 face of the (Mo/Nb)O5-epsilon polyhedron, where epsilon is the oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: The (Mo/Nb)-O distance is not kept constant due to the interexchange between the O2 octahedral and O3 tetrahedral coordinations during O2-O3 migration, but the Ba-O distance is kept constant to some extent in the O2-O3 diffusion pathways.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: The oxide-ion O2-O3 migration and O2/O3 disorders in the mixed tetrahedral and octahedral geometry are responsible for high oxide-ion conductivity.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e

Sentencas: These unique features of the diffusion pathways provide insights into its unique structural rearrangements and O2- mobility, leading to further developments of the oxide-ion conductors.
Titulo: Direct evidence for two-dimensional oxide-ion diffusion in the hexagonal perovskite-related oxide Ba3MoNbO8.5-δ Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available. See DOI: 10.1039/c9ta03588e
